dataset.title: Ecological inventory of Borassus aethiopum (Mart.) populations in the Pendjari Biosphere Reserve, Benin. Data mobilized in the framework of JRS Benin project

abstract.para: Occurrences derived from the list of plant species recorded during ecological inventory of Borassus aethiopum (Mart.) populations in plots set in Pendjari Biosphere Reserve
